title: Creates mental illness and chemical dependence initiative
summary: Creates mental illness and chemical dependence initiative designed to eliminate stigma and misinformation about mental illness and chemical dependence among military service members.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to creating a public education initiative designed to eliminate stigma and misinformation about mental illness and chemical dependence among military service members; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
